episodes.title: 'I'm going to say this, and the people of Remnant are not going to like this'
episodes.description: The son of Remnant Fellowship founder Gwen Shamblin, Michael, is the highest-level defector to ever leave and blow the whistle on the controversial Brentwood church.

episodes.title: Gwen Shamblin's daughter says she's ready to take mother's church to next level
episodes.description: She's the reclusive leader of a controversial Brentwood church who reportedly hasn't been seen at church services in years.

episodes.title: 'Take the damn filter off.' Former Remnant leader says church needs to admit role in child's death
episodes.description: It's time for Remnant Fellowship to come clean about its role in the 2003 child abuse death of a young Remnant boy, says a former leader in the controversial Brentwood, Tennessee, church.

episodes.title: Gwen Shamblin's son describes threat with sniper's bullet
episodes.description: A threat delivered with a sniper's bullet. That's just one of the startling claims from the son of controversial Brentwood religious figure Gwen Shamblin.

episodes.title: What motivated Gwen Shamblin? 'Praise, power, attention, the spotlight'
episodes.description: How does one process the feelings of betrayal by a religious leader — especially when that religious leader is also family? That's something Michael Shamblin is trying to figure out.

episodes.title: Gwen Shamblin's son breaks silence about life inside Remnant Fellowship, her Brentwood 'cult'
episodes.description: Michael Shamblin in exclusive interview: 'I look back on my life and go, 'What were we doing? What was I thinking?'

episodes.title: He thought I was 'the devil.' Now, he's telling me his story, Gwen Shamblin's Son
episodes.description: It's an interview I never thought I would do. Michael Shamblin — the son of Gwen Shamblin — sat down with me, decades after I dug into a religion of his mother's own making in Brentwood.

episodes.title: Gwen Shamblin plane crash concluded as 'pilot error'
episodes.description: The May 2021 airplane crash that killed Christian diet guru Gwen Shamblin, her husband and five other members of their church was the result of pilot error, according to the final report from the National Transportation Safety Board.

episodes.title: 2021: the year that Gwen Shamblin's life, death made news around world
episodes.description: It had been almost two decades since Gwen Shamblin was big news in Middle Tennessee. But that all changed in 2021.

episodes.title: 'DCS, CPS investigated' Remnant homes following boy's child abuse death, Gwen Shamblin testified
episodes.description: For years, Brentwood's Remnant Fellowship has faced questions about its teaching on child discipline - questions recently revived in an HBO Max docuseries

episodes.title: New Gwen Shamblin video: 'I think we are the most highly investigated church in the United States'
episodes.description: Newly obtained video shines new light into a controversial Brentwood church that has faced repeated accusations of being a cult.

episodes.title: Gwen Shamblin's will, potentially worth millions, leaves nothing to her Remnant Fellowship church
episodes.description: A NewsChannel 5 investigation discovered that Shamblin's last will and testament - involving an estate potentially worth millions of dollars -  is reviving old questions about her ministry -- and her money.

episodes.title: Gwen Shamblin will leaves nothing to Remnant Fellowship
episodes.description: A NewsChannel 5 investigation discovered that Shamblin's last will and testament - involving an estate potentially worth millions of dollars -  is reviving old questions about her ministry -- and her money.

episodes.title: OpenLine: Gwen Shamblin Lara, Remnant Fellowship, and the docuseries The Way Down (P1)
episodes.description: Carrie Sharp discusses the new docuseries “The Way Down” and the investigation into Gwen Shamblin Lara with Phil Williams, chief investigative reporter for newschannel5, on this episode of OpenLine.

episodes.title: HBO Max series examines Brentwood's Gwen Shamblin, Remnant Fellowship
episodes.description: Is a controversial Brentwood church a cult from which it's difficult for members to escape? That's one of the many questions raised by a new documentary series that begins streaming this week on HBO Max, looking into the world of Gwen Shamblin Lara and the Remnant Fellowship.

episodes.title: NTSB Releases Preliminary report of Smyrna plane crash
episodes.description: The NTSB released its preliminary report of a plane crash on Percy Priest Lake in Smyrna.

episodes.title: Percy Priest Lake plane crash: Both engines, more human remains recovered
episodes.description: On Monday, a barge and crane were put in the water to load up some of the wreckage.
